Name: Frequency of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ compared to \Manuscript Export Succeeded\
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that proceed to \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ after \First Look-Your updates are overdue\
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'First Look-Your updates are overdue'

Name: Number of times \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurs after \First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation\
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurrences out of all end-stage activities
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases where '' does not happen

Name: Frequency of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ as a concluding activity in the review process
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' for cases where activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' occurs

Name: Ratio of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ over \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ to understand reviewer agreement impact
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of variants leading to \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ as a final step
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity '' does not occur

Name: Percentage of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurrences following \Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation\
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Frequency of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ in relation to total activities for manuscripts that require major revisions
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Percentage of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ following \RW-EIC Accept\ to measure the impact of editorial acceptance
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Ratio of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurrences before and after \First Look-Please submit updates\ to evaluate the effectiveness of update requests
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'First Look-Please submit updates'

Name: Percentage of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ that lead to \Manuscript Export Succeeded\ as a measure of process completion
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Frequency of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ following \SW-EIC Major Revision\ to assess the impact of major revisions on the batching process
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision' occurs

Name: Number of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurrences per year to identify trends over time
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp', 'filter': "activity != ''"}"

Name: Number of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurrences grouped by submission month to identify peak submission periods
